name: The Ultimate Finding Nemo Quiz |     Movies

questions.text: What was the name of Marlin's wife and Nemo's mother?
questions.explanation:
Coral.

	Coral and Marlin lived in a sea anemone. They had several unborn children ready to be born in a few days. Marlin was going to name half of the children Coral Jr. and the other half Marlin Jr. Coral wanted one of the children to be named Nemo. Coral died trying to protect her unborn children from a barracuda. Only one child survived.

questions.text: Dory had several interesting names for Nemo. What name did she not give the little clown fish in the movie?
questions.explanation:
Fido.

	Dory called Nemo by then name of Chico when she was talking to Marlin about the school of fish helping them find Marlin's son. She called Nemo by the name of Fabio when she was describing Nemo to the school of fish. She referred to Nemo as Bingo when she was trying to contact a whale for help. While they were inside the whale, Dory referred to Nemo as Harpo. Finally, at the end of the movie when Nemo was on his way to school, Dory referred to Nemo by the name of Elmo.  Dory never called Nemo by the name of Fido.

questions.text: On what object did Marlin and Dory find the address of the person that kidnapped Nemo?
questions.explanation:
Diver's mask.

	P. Sherman's diver's mask fell off the boat and sank into the ocean. Dory was able to read the address on the diver's mask which belonged to P. Sherman, 42 Wallaby Way Sydney, Australia.

questions.text: "Fish are friends; not food." This statement was part of the mantra quoted by a great white shark that Dory and Marlin met named what?
questions.explanation:
Bruce.

	On their way to finding Nemo, Dory and Marlin met the three sharks (Bruce, Anchor, Chum) in a Sharks Anonymous meeting. Bruce invited Dory and Marlin to the meeting because the sharks were going through step 8 in the program which was invite a fish friend to the meeting.  Sharks Anonymous Mantra: "I am a nice shark; not a mindless eating machine. If I am to change this image I must first change myself. Fish are friends; not food."

questions.text: When meeting his new school friends for the first time, which one of Nemo's friends said he was H20 intolerant?
questions.explanation:
Sheldon, the seahorse.

	The kids at Nemo's new school were asking about his small fin. Marlin told them that they call it Nemo's lucky fin. Pearl said she had one short tentacle, Tad said he was obnoxious and Sheldon said he was H2O intolerant and then sneezed to prove his point.

questions.text: What was the occupation of the man that "saved" Nemo from the reef?
questions.explanation:
Dentist.

	When Nemo was dropped off in the aquarium, viewers learned that P. Sherman was a dentist. P. Sherman told one of his patients that he rescued the clown fish from the reef and was going to give him away as a present to his niece, Darla, for her eighth birthday.

questions.text: Why did the school of moonfish tell Dory to go through the trench that leads to the East Australian Current and not over the trench?
questions.explanation:
Jellyfish.

	Before Dory could leave the school of fish, they told Dory to go through the trench that would lead them to the EAC and not over it. The fish never told her why. When Marlin and Dory arrived at the trench, Dory tried to warn Marlin there was a reason they shouldn't go over the trench. Marlin insisted and they went over the trench. A bloom of jellyfish were at the top of the trench. They stung Dory and Marlin until both passed out.

questions.text: What was the name of the son of the 150 year old sea turtle named Crush?
questions.explanation:
Squirt.

	Squirt acted and sounded just like his dad. Squirt gave Marlin and Dory instructions on how to leave the EAC. Marlin couldn't understand a word Squirt said, but had to leave the EAC before he could ask Squirt to repeat himself.

questions.text: In the aquarium, when did Gill say P. Sherman's niece, Darla, was coming to pick up Nemo?
questions.explanation:
Friday.

	Darla was the soon-to-be eight year old niece of P. Sherman. She had already killed one fish and the other fish in the aquarium were scared of her. Gill mentioned to the aquarium gang that Darla would be at the office on Friday and would get Nemo then as her birthday present.

questions.text: When the aquarium gang made their escape to the ocean, who was the last fish seen rolling into the ocean?
questions.explanation:
Peach, the starfish.

	The escapees of P. Sherman's aquarium were: Gill, Deb, Bloat, Peach, Bubbles, Jacques, and Gurgle. Peach was the last one to roll her bag into the water. She commented that the timing of the red light had gotten shorter. When they were floating along in the ocean, Bloat said, "Now, what?"
